articles.title: US job growth rebounds in November; unemployment rate ticks up - Reuters
articles.description: U.S. job growth surged in November after being severely hindered by hurricanes and strikes, but a rise in the unemployment rate to 4.2% pointed to an easing labor market that should allow the Federal Reserve to cut interest rates again this month.
